title: League of Legends Sent me an Enail
body:
I was sent an E-Mail from <leagueoflegends@email.riotgames.com> stating 

"As part of our ongoing efforts to make League of Legends the best game online, we're conducting onsite playtests to test what we’re working on!
You've been randomly selected for the opportunity to sign up for a playtest at a facility near the Riot campus in West LA. You will be compensated for your time.
There will only be a limited number of players chosen, so please fill out the form as soon as possible to have the best chance of getting picked."

Is this legit or no?
